wordpressWpDailyReads.title: Daily Reads 8/13/2019
wordpressWpDailyReads.content:
Hi, everyone. For this Tuesday, we hear Venmo announce that they will now support instant transfer to U.S. banks. Read Michael Batnick’s take on current interest rates and why risk is an essential and beneficial factor here. A new article takes a deep dive into relationships, and how individual debt has an impact. United Airlines adds biometric clearances for passengers with new clear partnership. And check out these three secrets for beating performance anxiety.

BUSINESS

Venmo launches instant transfers to bank accounts

PayPal -owned payments app Venmo today announced support for instant transfers to U.S. bank accounts.

 

INVESTING

The Quote of the Decade

You are owed nothing. This goes for investors who take risk in the stock market, and it goes doubly for people who don’t take much risk at all.

 

PERSONAL FINANCE

Is debt a dealbreaker? Couples say it depends on the type

Nearly a quarter of Americans have lied to a partner about their debt.

BUSINESS

United Airlines Adds Biometric Clearance for Passengers With Clear Partnership

Carrier plans to bring Clear biometric screening to hubs in Chicago, Houston and Newark.

 

PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT

3 Secrets to Beat Performance Anxiety

Performance anxiety makes us second-guess everything from how to shoot a free throw to what to say next in an interview.
